patterns: what are the courses offered at CE Kidangoor?
What are the main courses offered?
responses: courses offered are ECE, EEE, CSE AND CE

patterns: will there be any extra curriculum activities?
does the college conducts any fun program?
Are there any fests in college?
responses: Our college not only provides excellent education but also encourage students to take part in different curricular activities. The college conducts yearly programs like Sports meet, Arts day, College day, Lumiere is the national level techno-cultural fest hosted by our college.  It is a two day event and have participants from across kerala.  Our college has volleyball court, football ground and many more refreshment zones.

patterns: how long will be B.tech course?
how long will it take to complete B.tech ?
time required to complete the course
responses: 4 years

patterns: what is the location of the college
responses: College is located at kidangoor, kottayam

patterns: how many semesters are there in a year
how many semesters one should study in a year
responses: There are two semesters in a year.

patterns: how many months are there in a semester
how long will be a single semester
responses: The single semester will be around 4 months.

patterns: what are the student requirements for admission
responses: candidates should produce 10,+2 certificates ,physics, chemistry, maths marklist, keam ranklist and marklist,  allotment memo

patterns: how many classes will be there in a day
how lo ng are the classes?
responses: There may be five or six classes per day. Each class will be of 1 hour.

patterns: what facilities are provided by the college?
what are the facilities of college for students
responses: With excellent education facilities, Our College provides various other facilities like 24 hours internet, library, classes with AC, discusson room, canteen, parking space, and student service for any students queries.

patterns: how much is the college fee
responses: 35000 is the fees per year for merit seat,65000 for management seat and 1 lakh for NRI seats as fixed by govt.

patterns: how many workshops in first year?
responses: In first year you will be having two workshops - Basics of civil & mechanical engg and Basics of electrical and electronics engg.  And afterwards you don't have any workshops ,only labs.

patterns: who is the principal of the college
responses: Dr.B.V. Mathew is the principal of  college of engineering kidangoor

patterns: do the college provide hostel facilities?
responses: college provides hostel facilities for both boys and girls. Girls hostel is inside the campus and hostel facilities for boys are arranged by the college.

patterns: do the college offers placement facilities?
responses: Yes, our college offers placements. Our placement companies include TCS,TATA ELXI,INFOSYS,WIPRO,EXPERION,UST GLOBAL,PIT SOLUTIONS,QBURST,QUEST GLOBAL,COGNIZANT, and many others. Placements start by the start of final year, that is in the 7th sem. EC,EEE and CS students get placement offers.
